BR_text.BRsummary: Image not show on Google Colab Jupyter Notebook
BR_text.BRdescription:
Method img.show(), not working on Jupyter Notebook.
 Runtime:
 
 Python 3.6.7
 Google Colab Jupyter Notebook
 Turicreate 5.2.1
 
 <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/9210835/50372208-bbabb280-05fc-11e9-8c86-33a4913027fd.PNG></denchmark-link>

comments_0.comment_text:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/ancs21>@ancs21</denchmark-link>
  - Using your code in Python 3.6 with a local instance of Jupyter Notebook, the image gets displayed fine for me. Could you please tell us the values you get for the following two expressions:
 1 - 
 2 -

comments_1.comment_text:
Hello <denchmark-link:https://github.com/TobyRoseman>@TobyRoseman</denchmark-link>
 
 The values two expressions run on Google Colab Jupyter Notebook:
 1 - 'auto'
 2 - 'Shell'
 Thanks.

comments_2.comment_text:
Thanks <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ancs21>@ancs21</denchmark-link>
 . The second expression seems to be what is causing this issue.
 <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apple/turicreate/blob/58936c60fcddec23ed00e2b781c652e2fed39ff4/src/unity/python/turicreate/data_structures/image.py#L230>Looking at the code</denchmark-link>
  we expect this values to be .

comments_3.comment_text:
I understand. Many thanks <denchmark-link:https://github.com/TobyRoseman>@TobyRoseman</denchmark-link>
 
 Fix this issues with code:  get_ipython().__class__.__name__ = "ZMQInteractiveShell"
 Check again:
 <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/9210835/50605643-6ffae200-0ef5-11e9-83f1-dc14784c451e.png></denchmark-link>

comments_4.comment_text: Reopening; we should fix this in Turi Create itself so users don't need the workaround.

comments_5.comment_text:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/TobyRoseman>@TobyRoseman</denchmark-link>
